metadata.synopsis: This owlbear has been captured by the goblins. It is a cub and has been tormented by the goblins. In this dialog the player can reassure it, guide it to safety, or encourage it to attack the goblins. If the player has convinced his captors to release him, they can invite him to their camp. The owlbear refuses - but will show up later on his own.

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *The cub breathes in shallow bursts, his chest heaving with the effort.*
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking aboutNodeContext: SFX only

12.speaker: Owlbear Cub
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking aboutNodeContext: SFX only

54.speaker: Player
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Kneel down - you won't hurt him.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

24.speaker: Owlbear Cub
24.text: *You notice a shiver run through his feathered coat - fear, a desperate longing for the safety of his nest.*
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *You notice a shiver run through his feathered coat - fear, a desperate longing for the safety of his nest.*
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *But his mother is gone - taken. All that's left are these creatures.*
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Offer him your hand. He can follow your scent to your camp in the wilderness.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

37.speaker: Owlbear Cub
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tilts his head and regards the player.NodeContext: SwA line He's considering trusting the player.

50.speaker: Owlbear Cub
50.text: Got to get away from here first.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.InternalNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *The cub seems anxious to leave, but afraid to defy the goblins. They have to be dealt with, one way or another.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.InternalNodeContext: The cub looks around, hooting anxiously. Not safe to leave yet.

79.speaker: Narrator
79.text: *The cub tilts his head. He's considering it.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *He runs away. Only time will tell if he'll reappear.*
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cub backs away and leaves.

48.speaker: Owlbear Cub
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cub tilts head, considering player, then backs away and leaves.NodeContext: SFX only - do not record.

82.context: NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

77.speaker: Owlbear Cub
77.context: NodeContext: SFX only - do not record

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *The cub looks at you with dulled eyes. He longs for home.*

20.speaker: Owlbear Cub
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry.NodeContext: SFX only - Angry

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *... it's furious. Rage blazes within it. Tear. Hunt. Kill.*
19.context: NodeContext: The player has freed the owlbear. It is tentatively following the player but is prepared to attack should it be provoked.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Coax the cub toward the goalposts.
60.context: NodeContext: The player has freed the owlbear. It is tentatively following the player but is prepared to attack should it be provoked.

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: *The owlbear coos softly. He doesn't understand - but he trusts you.*
42.context: NodeContext: The player has freed the owlbear. It is tentatively following the player but is prepared to attack should it be provoked.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *The owlbear coos softly. He doesn't understand - but he trusts you.*
16.context: NodeContext: The player has freed the owlbear. It is tentatively following the player but is prepared to attack should it be provoked.

30.text: *The cub's feathers ruffle in distrust. With a defiant squawk, he bounds away.*

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *The cub's feathers ruffle in distrust. With a defiant squawk, he bounds away.*

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Guide his gaze to the goblins - they deserve to die.
13.context: NodeContext: The owlbear is furious and about to erupt in a killing spree.

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *The cub's beak snaps in the air, eager to rend, yearning for blood and soft belly-flesh.*
38.context: NodeContext: The owlbear is furious and about to erupt in a killing spree.

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *The cub's beak snaps in the air, eager to rend, yearning for blood and soft belly-flesh.*
29.context: NodeContext: The owlbear is furious and about to erupt in a killing spree.

23.text: *The cub clicks his beak weakly - more scared than afraid. He has no fight left in him.*
23.context: NodeContext: The owlbear doesn't trust the player and is warding it off.

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: *The cub clicks his beak weakly - more scared than afraid. He has no fight left in him.*
63.context: NodeContext: The owlbear doesn't trust the player and is warding it off.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Nod to the goalposts - he'll be safe there.

56.text: *Its talons bite deep into the earth, every muscle trembling. You realise it isn't afraid...*

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *Its talons bite deep into the earth, every muscle trembling. You realise it isn't afraid...*

27.speaker: Owlbear Cub
27.context: NodeContext: As in: "Go away! I'll bite you! I'll really do it!"

28.speaker: Owlbear Cub
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking aboutNodeContext: SFX only - Exasperated/On-Edge

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *Talons tensed to strike, beak aching to rend - the cub wants you gone.*
31.context: NodeContext: The cub no longer trusts the player and wants him gone. A threat.

36.speaker: Owlbear Cub
36.context: NodeContext: As in: "I have to run! They'll get me!"

46.speaker: Owlbear Cub
46.context: NodeContext: As in: "Mommy's gone. I'm hungry!"

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I have a camp. You're welcome there.

55.speaker: Owlbear Cub
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Angry.NodeContext: SFX only. Angry.

73.speaker: Owlbear Cub
73.context: NodeContext: As in: "The goblins are going to hurt me. I have to run! Where can I run?!"

2.speaker: Player
2.text: See those posts? Run toward them.
2.context: NodeContext: As in: "It'll be safe there? I have to run!"

66.speaker: Owlbear Cub
66.context: NodeContext: As in: "It'll be safe there? I have to run!"

85.speaker: Owlbear Cub
85.context: NodeContext: As in: "It'll be safe there? I have to run!"

72.context: NodeContext: As in: "No! They'll hurt me! I have to run!"

26.speaker: Owlbear Cub
26.context: NodeContext: As in: "No! They'll hurt me! I have to run!"

61.speaker: Player
61.text: The goblins are responsible for your pain. Kill them.
61.context: NodeContext: As in: "I'm going to kill them!"

10.speaker: Player
10.text: The goblins tried to hurt you. Show them what hurt really means.
10.context: NodeContext: As in: "I'm going to kill them!"

71.context: NodeContext: As in: "I'm going to kill them!"

65.speaker: Owlbear Cub
65.context: NodeContext: As in: "I'm going to kill them!"

40.speaker: Player
40.text: They won't hurt you if you run to those posts.

74.speaker: Owlbear Cub
74.context: NodeContext: As in: "I want to go home to my cave, to my mother."
